segments.description: 1. You can customize the picture, including the picture layout, the picture's border, and so on.
2. If you want to set an image to the picture or change the picture's image, use the src method to change the image. The picture's src can be a base64 image.

You can change the picture's layout by using the pictureStretch method. Stretch for the picture is defined by the ImageLayout enum. Sometimes you can get the image's original size using getOriginalWidth and getOriginalHeight methods.
